Why We Built This

We believe health tools should be accessible to everyone ‚Äî without barriers. That's why we created a BMI calculator that works instantly, requires no registration, and respects your privacy.

How It Works

Your Privacy Matters

We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. Not your height, not your weight, not your IP address. Everything you enter stays on your device. Period.

This is a true zero-data website.
